models.name: animal_cell
models.description: Complete animal cell with nucleus, mitochondria, ER, Golgi, ribosomes, lysosomes, centrioles

models.name: plant_vs_animal_cell
models.description: Side-by-side comparison: animal cell (left) vs plant cell (right) with cell wall, chloroplasts, large vacuole

models.name: mitochondria

models.name: cell_membrane

models.name: cell_division
models.description: Mitosis stages: Prophase, Metaphase, Anaphase, Telophase showing chromosome movement and cytokinesis
